title: FOR, a Novel Orphan Nuclear Receptor Related to Farnesoid X Receptor

institutions: Department of Biology, Chonnam National University
Marine Biotechnology Laboratory, School of Earth and Environmental Science, Seoul National University
Department of Life Science, Sogang University
Laboratory of Molecular Embryology, NICHD, National Institutes of Health
Thyroid Division, Brigham and Women’s Hospital, Harvard Medical School
Department of Cellular and Molecular Biology, Baylor College of Medicine
experimental_methods: screening cDNA libraries with conventional receptor cDNA probes at relaxed stringency
performing PCR with degenerate oligonucleotide PCR primers from the DBD
screening cDNA libraries using nuclear receptor ligand binding domains (LBD) or receptor interaction domains of co-activators as bait in a yeast two-hybrid system
cloning and characterization of orphan nuclear receptor FOR17837
reagents_chemicals: digoxigenin labeled sense or FOR1 riboprobes
LBD region of FOR corresponding to 319 amino acids for FOR1 and 346 amino acids for FOR2
VP16AD fusion constructs for FOR1 and -2
